explanation: [0-0] A brown adult horse stands on a wooden bridge. A much smaller brown and white foal is stuck between the wooden planks of the bridge, looking distressed. There is a small dirt path at the head of the bridge, with green plants along the side.

[0-3] As the camera zooms in, the foal can be seen more clearly trapped between the wooden planks, with the adult horse standing beside it and watching. The white text "SOUND ON" and a small white speaker icon appear in the upper left corner of the screen. In the upper right corner, a white box appears with the text "RD READER'S DIGEST."
